'''Figurine Fabrication''' is a subevent during [[Summertide Scales and Tales]].

It is unlocked by completing the {{Quest|"Good Shelf"}} and can be accessed from the {{Icon|Fantastical Fabricator}} icon.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|text1    = In the Summertide Scales and Tales event, you can use {{Color|help|Starsail Coins}} gained from game modes within "Mosaic of Moments" to create many model figurines in Figurine Fabrication.
|image1   = Tutorial Figurine Fabrication 1.png
|text2    = Fairytale Figurines related to each region's theme can be mounted on said region's "Good Shelf."<br>During the event, these Figurines can be {{Color|help|exchanged with and given to your friends}}.
|image2   = Tutorial Figurine Fabrication 2.png
}}
